testCaseName: Login to OrangeHRM and Verify Personal Details - First Name Not Empty
description: Registered user logs in to the OrangeHRM demo site, navigates to My Info, reads the First Name, prints it, and asserts it is not empty.

steps.target: Username input field on Login form
Password input field on Login form

steps.expectedValidation: Dashboard is displayed (e.g., 'Dashboard' header visible and/or URL indicates dashboard).

steps.target: My Info menu item in left sidebar
steps.expectedValidation: Navigation to My Info page is initiated.

steps.target: Personal Details section on My Info page
First Name input field in Personal Details
steps.expectedValidation: First Name value is captured and stored as variable 'firstNameValue'.
First Name value is printed to the console.
First Name value is not null, not empty, and not whitespace-only.
